title: For person of unknown name
context: §660-14 For person of unknown name. The person to be produced shall be designated by the person&rsquo;s name, if known, and if that is not known or is uncertain, the person may be designated in any other manner, so that it can be known who is the person intended. [L 1870, c 32, §10; RL 1925, §2737; RL 1935, §4322; RL 1945, §10363; RL 1955, §239-14; HRS §660-14; gen ch 1985]
